data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silveira, Diego Dutra, Barcellos, Aline, Knyshov, Alexander (2019): Hoplonannus australis sp. nov. (Hemiptera, Schizopteridae): amended diagnosis of the genus and first record from South America. Zootaxa 4568 (2): 394-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4568.2.13|15 occurrences
